    pycheron.util.logger¶

    class Logger(filename)[source]¶

    Creates a logging object to be fed into metrics or callPycheronMetric to log errors, metric calculation duration, and warnings.

    error(message)[source]¶
    Parameters:message (str) – Error message
    log(message)[source]¶
    Parameters:message (str) – Log message
    warn(message)[source]¶
    Parameters:message (str) – Warn message
